name: perfyll
description: Perfyll, a lightweight JavaScript library, seamlessly integrates Real User Monitoring (RUM), Application Performance Monitoring (APM), Log Management, and Error Tracking with the efficiency of a cloud service. Elevate your application's performance effortlessly. Explore more at https://perfyll.com
author: Claudivan Filho

scripts.run:next14: cd tests/e2e/next14/application && npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:3000
scripts.cy:next14: npm run kill-port-3000 && npm run run:next14 && cypress run --spec "tests/e2e/next14/specs/smoke.cy.js" && npm run kill-port-3000
scripts.run:next13: cd tests/e2e/next13/application && npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:3000
scripts.cy:next13: npm run kill-port-3000 && npm run run:next13 && cypress run --spec "tests/e2e/next13/specs/smoke.cy.js" && npm run kill-port-3000
scripts.run:vue3: cd tests/e2e/vue/application && npm run dev & wait-on http://localhost:5173
scripts.cy:vue3: npm run kill-port-5173 && npm run run:vue3 && cypress run --spec "tests/e2e/vue/specs/smoke.cy.js" && npm run kill-port-5173
